.. _Db module:

Module: db
==========
This module is used to manage database connection.

General usage:

.. code-block:: none

    ğŸ¦ > db <submodule>

db connect
----------
This submodule tries to connect to the database.

.. code-block:: none

    ğŸ¦ > db connect

db disconnect
-------------
This submodule tries to disconnect from the database.

.. code-block:: none

    ğŸ¦ > db disconnect

db status
---------
This submodule prints the database connection status.

.. code-block:: none

    ğŸ¦ > db status
